eyesDownwards.label: Look at the camera, then LOWER your EYES, then return to the camera

eyesShiftLeft.label: Look at the camera, then shift your EYES to the LEFT , then return to the camera

eyesShiftRight.label: Look at the camera, then shift your EYES to the RIGHT , then return to the camera

eyesUpwards.label: Look at the camera, then RAISE your EYES, then return to the camera

faceFrontLeft.label: Keep your head upright, then incline it to the left, then return to the front

faceFrontRight.label: Keep your head upright, then incline it to the right, then return to the front

error.does_not_meet_criteria_for_acceptable_fa: Doesn't meet the criteria for an acceptable face match.

warning.wrong_face_width_message: Face width is not in the correct range.
warning.wrong_face_height_message: Face height is not in the correct range.
warning.wrong_face_center_message: Face center is not in the correct position.
warning.face_not_detected_message: Face detection failed. Check lighting conditions.
warning.face_with_glasses_message: You are using glasses, please remove them
